A medium-sized patch of fog generated by a {{Class|FogSpawner}} actor. ==== [[DECORATE]] definition ==== ACTOR FogPatchMedium : {{Class|FogPatchSmall}} { States { Spawn: FOGM ABCDE 7 [[A_FogMove]] Loop Death: FOGS ABCDE 5 Goto Super::Death } }
